Submodules¶

Client.game module¶

class Client.game.Game¶

Bases: object

Class representing a game. Holds information about the players, categories, words, scores…

download_words()¶

Downloads words from database and saves to json file

game_over()¶

Stop game and show scores

get_categories_fromFile(filename)¶

Opens file with given name and returns categories

Parameters

filename – string - name of file

:return list of categories

get_current_nickname()¶

Returns nickname of current player

Returns

string

get_game_id()¶

Finds available game id in database

Returns

integer representing game id

get_random_word()¶

Looks for a new word in list of words

Returns

string representing the random word

get_words_fromFile(filename)¶

Opens file with given name and returns words

Parameters

filename – string - name of file

Returns

list of words

playerExists(nick)¶

Returns True if the player exists

Parameters

nick – string representing the player

Returns

boolean

playerLogin(nick)¶

Login player with given nick by fetching data from db

Parameters

nick – string representing the player

player_add(nickname, email, avatar, gender)¶

Create a new player from given parameters and add it to the game (and database)

Parameters

  • nickname – string representing the player

  • email – string

  • avatar – integer

  • gender – boolean

player_remove(name)¶

Remove player from the game

Parameters

name – string representing the player

player_remove_all()¶

Remove all players from the game

run()¶

Run game and show login window.

send_scores()¶
set_category(name)¶

Change current category to given category name

Parameters

name – string representing the category

set_game_id(id)¶

Set the game id and update mainWindow

Parameters

id – integer

set_online()¶

Set game to online mode

start_game()¶

Prepare game to start: chooses category, word and start new round.

update_categories()¶

Update list of categories

update_words()¶

Update list of words. If game offline read from encrypted file.

Client.main module¶

Client.main.main()¶

Runs the game in online or offline mode.

Client.round module¶

class Client.round.Round(game, category=None, word=None)¶

Bases: object

Class representing a single round. Holds information about current: word, player, time, lifes left…

guess_letter(letter)¶

Check if letter is in current word and serve it. :param letter: character

guess_word(word)¶

Check if guessed word matches current word and serve it. :param word: string

next()¶

Runs next round

next_player()¶

Selects the next player (in a defined order)

randomize_order()¶

Randomize the order of the players

timeout()¶

Decrease time left, if time left is zero, move to next player.

wrong_guess()¶

Decrease current lifes and move to the next player, if lifes left is zero show answer.
